member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AdvancedFilters.GetRadius(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState,System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates a radius based on the provided value, using min(width/height) as the normalizing factor. Querystring values are interpreted as 1/1000ths of the normalizing factor.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AdvancedFilters.AdjustContrastBrightnessSaturation(AForge.Imaging.Filters.HSLLinear,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.param: -1..1 float to adjust luminance (brightness). 0 does nothing
-1..1 float to adjust saturation. 0 does nothing
If false, adjusting brightness and luminance will adjust contrast also. True causes white/black washout instead.
